document.full_text: the strokes guitarist nick valensi called making the band's new album "angles" "just awful," but despite a fractious recording process most critics seem pleased the new york rockers are finally back.
document.title: making new strokes album "awful"; reviews to rescue
lines_and_colors: the strokes guitarist nick valensi called making the band's new album "angles" "just awful," but despite a fractious recording process most critics seem pleased the new york rockers are finally back.
